Package eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction

Class RecipeMapBuilder

java.lang.Object
eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction.RecipeMapBuilder
public class RecipeMapBuilder extends Object
Used for RecipeMap creation.

Used for MultiblockBuilder.withRecipeMap(RecipeMap).

ZenClass:
mods.gregtech.recipe.FactoryRecipeMap

    • setSlotOverlay

      Set a custom overlay for all slots of this kind.
      Parameters:
      isOutput - Whether this should apply to output slots, instead of input slots.
      isFluid - Whether this should apply to fluid slots, instead of item slots.
      isLast - Whether this should apply only to the last slot of this kind.
      slotOverlay - The overlay texture.
      Returns:
      This builder, for convenience.
